page.title: 13Day in my life (1):Hadleigh
page.content: 7.15a.m.Dad gets ready for work.7.30 I get up and get my breakfast ready. I also get some for my sister because she gets up next.Then we go to get the milk together. Mum gets up at about 8.00a.m. My sister and I play till it is time to go to school. 9.00a.m. school starts, Mum teaches. Dinner time is at 12.00. We finish school at 3.20p.m. When we get home my sister and I play in the garden or watch T.V. 5.00 my Dad comes home, my family then have our tea. After tea we do the washing up and my sister and I play in our bedrooms till it's time for bed at about 8.15p.m. and we read till about 8.45p.m.
